itunes:title: Episode 484 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/01/19 - The Return Of A** Eatin' Season
title: Episode 484 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/01/19 - The Return Of A** Eatin' Season
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the cancellation of the Atlanta Falcons for 2019, the return of the "real" season, a preview of the MLB playoffs including World Series predictions, we unveil our Heisman Top 5 list so far, go over every point spre...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the cancellation of the Atlanta Falcons for 2019, the return of the "real" season, a preview of the MLB playoffs including World Series predictions, we unveil our Heisman Top 5 list so far, go over every point spread for the College and NFL slate this weekend, and Ross makes a bet with a Seattle Seahawks listener... a team he despises.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the cancellation of the Atlanta Falcons for 2019, the return of the "real" season, a preview of the MLB playoffs including World Series predictions, we unveil our Heisman Top 5 list so far, go over every point spread for the College and NFL slate this weekend, and Ross makes a bet with a Seattle Seahawks listener... a team he despises.
